summary.span: 标记给定操作系统版本中已删除或不受支持的 API。

span.span: Marks APIs that were removed or are unsupported in a given operating system version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Versionless 属性主要用于指示平台不受平台支持。The versionless attribute is primarily used to indicate the API is unsupported for the platform. 如果指定了版本，则 API 仅在早期版本中可用。If a version is specified, the API is only available in earlier versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string platformName) cil managed

param.name: platformName
param.span: 不受支持的 OS 平台名称，可以选择包括版本。

span.span: The unsupported OS platform name, optionally including a version.

summary.span: 为指定的不受支持的 OS 平台初始化 属性类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the attribute class for the specified unsupported OS platform.
